analyzed: gcig la gcig brjod par bya ba nyid du byed pa dang / gcig la gcig 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang / gcig gis gcig lhung ba las slong ba nyid de lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i 'khor 'di 'phel bar 'gyur gyi 'phags ma skar rgyal khyod bdag nyid brjod par bya ba @184a * //
translated: They speak to each other, they instruct each other, and they lift each other up from downfalls. In this way, the retinue of the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, will increase. Noble Star-like Lady, please stop this kind of activity that makes you unsuitable to be spoken to.

original: ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i pas kyis bsgo ba mdzad na /
analyzed: ma yin par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces gsol ba dang bzhi'i pas kyis bsgo ba mdzad na /
translated: If you do not stop, the Blessed One will give you a formal act of announcement.

original: 'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma skar rgyal la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
analyzed: 'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma skar rgyal la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste /
translated: Noble ones, if you accept that the formal act of announcement be done to the nun Star-like, remain silent. Those who do not accept, speak up. This is the first announcement.

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: In the same way, do it a second and a third time.🔽 🔽The formal act of announcement has been done to the nun Star-like.

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma skar rgyal la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma skar rgyal la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad lags te /
translated: If the noble saṅgha grants me forbearance and patience, the noble saṅgha will perform the act of instructing the bhikṣuṇī Tiṣya with the four requests.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since the noble saṅgha is silent, it is considered approved.

original: de ni bka' blo mi bde ba las bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni bka' blo mi bde ba las bzlog pa'i phyir bsgo ba'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the rite and the act of instructing in order to turn the mind away from being disobedient.

original: 'bral ba'i spang ba'i skabs nas dge slong chos gos min pas sra brkyang phyung na /
analyzed: 'bral ba'i spang ba'i skabs nas dge slong chos gos min pas sra brkyang phyung na /
translated: In the context of the offense of separation, if a bhikṣu who is not in his robes takes down his rains-residence,

original: gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na /
analyzed: gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na /
translated: if he separates from any of the three robes, even for one night, outside the boundaries,

original: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i lhung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i lhung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la /
translated: except if the saṅgha has given permission, it is a downfall that requires relinquishment.

original: dge slong ma rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: dge slong ma rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa yin la /
translated: In the context of this downfall, an old bhikṣuṇī became ill.

original: de'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar mi nus na dge 'dun gyis de la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar mi nus na dge 'dun gyis de la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: If she is unable to care for it because her patched robe is heavy, the saṅgha should give her permission not to be separated from her patched robe.🔽This is how it is done.

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: The bedding should be arranged, the gaṇḍī should be struck, and the nuns should be summoned with the announcement.

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la ;🔽dge slong ma des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la ; dge slong ma des bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te rgan rims bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: When the entire saṅgha of nuns is present and has assembled,🔽the nun should put her upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect to the most senior nun,🔽and then sit down in front of the most senior nun with her palms together.

original: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog bur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog bur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge 'dun la snam sbyar nye bar bstan te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: She should point to her patched robe and say this:

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
translated: “Noble saṅgha of nuns, please listen!

original: bdag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa lags la /
translated: I, the nun Dharmadinnā, am an old woman who has become decrepit.

original: bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rdo mi thog nas bdag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i @184b gnang ba gsol na /
analyzed: bdag gi snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rdo mi thog nas bdag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i @184b gnang ba gsol na /
translated: “My outer robe is heavy, and I am unable to carry it. I, the elder nun Dharmadinnā, am old, aged, and infirm. I request permission from the noble saṅgha of nuns not to be separated from my outer robe.

original: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang stsal du gsol /
analyzed: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang stsal du gsol /
translated: I, the elder nun Dharmadinnā, am old, aged, and infirm. I request permission from the compassionate noble saṅgha of nuns out of compassion not to be separated from my outer robe.”

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: This should be repeated a second and a third time.

original: de ni snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the request for permission not to be separated from the outer robe.

original: de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //🔽'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: After that, one nun should make a motion and the formal act should be performed.🔽This is how it should be done.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say this:

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
translated: “The noble saṅgha of nuns, please listen!

original: dge slong ma chos byin 'di rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la gsal 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rdo mi thog nas dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di /
analyzed: dge slong ma chos byin 'di rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la gsal 'di'i snam sbyar ni lci bas yongs su skyong bar rdo mi thog nas dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di /
translated: This nun Dharmadinnā is an old woman who has become decrepit. Her patched robe is heavy, and she is unable to care for it. This nun Dharmadinnā, an old woman who has become decrepit,

original: dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang mi 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na /
analyzed: dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang mi 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol na /
translated: is requesting permission from the Saṅgha not to be separated from her patched robe.

original: gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
translated: If the time is right and the Noble Saṅgha can bear it,🔽may the Noble Saṅgha grant permission.

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas ba dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal to //
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas ba dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal to //
translated: The Noble Saṅgha will grant permission to the nun Dharmadinnā, an old woman who has become decrepit, not to be separated from her patched robe.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is as follows:

original: dge 'du ni 'phags rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'du ni 'phags rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
translated: The Noble Saṅgha, please listen to me.

original: dge slong ma chos byin 'di rgan mo rgas ba dgog tu gyur pa lags la /
analyzed: dge slong ma chos byin 'di rgan mo rgas ba dgog tu gyur pa lags la /
translated: This nun Dharmadinnā is an old woman who has become decrepit.

analyzed: 'di'i snam sbyar ni lcibs yongs su skyong bar rdo mi thog nas /
translated: The hem of her patched robe is so worn that a stone could be put under it.

original: dge slong ma chos byin rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te /
analyzed: dge slong ma chos byin rgan po rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa 'di dge 'dun las snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol te /
translated: This nun Dharmadinnā is old, aged, and decrepit. She requests permission from the saṅgha not to be separated from her patched robe.🔽If the noble saṅgha grants permission for the nun Dharmadinnā, who is old, aged, and decrepit, not to be separated from her patched robe,

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnad ba gsol na /🔽'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig /🔽dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo @185a * //
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnad ba gsol na /🔽'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig /🔽dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma chos byin rgan mo @185a * //
translated: then let the noble saṅgha listen to this. The noble saṅgha grants permission for the nun Dharmadinnā, who is old, aged, and decrepit, not to be separated from her patched robe.🔽Since the noble saṅgha approves and is silent, this is how I understand it to be.

original: rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te /
analyzed: rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te /
translated: The elder nun has been granted permission not to be separated from her patched robe.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since he has remained silent, this is how I understand it to be.

original: de ni rgan mo la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni rgan mo la snam sbyar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba sbyin pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the ritual and the rite for granting permission not to be separated from the patched robe to an elder nun.

original: gser dngul la reg ba spang ba'i skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang rang gis gser dang dngul len nam /
analyzed: gser dngul la reg ba spang ba'i skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang rang gis gser dang dngul len nam /
translated: In the section on abandoning the handling of gold and silver, it says, “If a nun herself takes gold and silver,🔽or if she tells someone to take it, she commits a downfall that requires relinquishment.”

original: len du 'jug na yang spang ba'i lhung byed do zhes gsungs pa de la 'di snyam du dgongs te kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can dag kyang gos kyi rin dag sbyin par byed la /
analyzed: len du 'jug na yang spang ba'i lhung byed do zhes gsungs pa de la 'di snyam du dgongs te kye ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can dag kyang gos kyi rin dag sbyin par byed la /
translated: The Buddha thought, “Alas, the faithful brahmins and householders give the cost of robes,

original: nga'i nyan thos ma rnams kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyi pas nyan thos ma rnams la rung bar bya ba cung zhig gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas /
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos ma rnams kyang gos kyi rin dag 'dod kyi pas nyan thos ma rnams la rung bar bya ba cung zhig gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas /
translated: and my nuns want the cost of robes. I will allow the nuns to accept something suitable.”

original: bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bka' stsal ba /
translated: He said,🔽“Monastics, I allow you to accept the cost of robes.”

original: blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o //
translated: Having accepted it, one should keep it with confidence in that very donor.

original: gzhan yang dge slong mas zhal ta byed par spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang dge slong mas zhal ta byed par spro bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, a nun should be enthusiastic about acting as steward.🔽Moreover, a nun should accept it and having accepted it, she should consecrate it in the presence of the nuns.

original: gzhan yang dge slong mas blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong ma'i mdun du byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pas rung ba gsum bka' stsal te /
analyzed: gzhan yang dge slong mas blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang dge slong ma'i mdun du byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes gsungs pas rung ba gsum bka' stsal te /
translated: Thus, the three kinds of proper are stated:

original: sbyin bdag bdag po nyid du mos su gzhug pa dang / zhal te byed pa bdag po nyid du khas len du gzhug pa dang / byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sbyin bdag bdag po nyid du mos su gzhug pa dang / zhal te byed pa bdag po nyid du khas len du gzhug pa dang / byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o //
translated: the donor should be made to aspire to be the owner, the steward should be made to accept being the owner, and it should be consecrated.

original: de la rud ba dang po'i cho ga ni dge slong mas chos gos kyi zong rin po che dag rnyed pa na blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la rud ba dang po'i cho ga ni dge slong mas chos gos kyi zong rin po che dag rnyed pa na blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang sbyin bdag de nyid la yid brtan te bcang bar bya'o //
translated: The rite of the first proper is that when a nun obtains precious goods for cloth for robes, she should accept it and having accepted it, she should keep it with confidence in that very donor.

original: rung ba gnyis pa'i cho ga ni dge slong ma rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po gang cung zad ci snyed pa de thams cad sbyin bdag zhal ta byed pa kun dga' ra ba 'am dge bsnyen spro bar bya zhing de'i
analyzed: rung ba gnyis pa'i cho ga ni dge slong ma rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po gang cung zad ci snyed pa de thams cad sbyin bdag zhal ta byed pa kun dga' ra ba 'am dge bsnyen spro bar bya zhing de'i
translated: The ritual for the second type of permissible is that the nuns should give to the donors, the administrators, the monastery, or the lay brother who is enthusiastic, all the things that are not permissible for as long as they live.

original: ming gis bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming gis bcang bar bya'o //
translated: They should be kept in his name.

original: rung ba gsum pa'i cho ga ni mi gzung bar mdun du bzhag nas dge slong ma'i mdun du 'greng ste /
analyzed: rung ba gsum pa'i cho ga ni mi gzung bar mdun du bzhag nas dge slong ma'i mdun du 'greng ste /
translated: The ritual for the third type of permissible is that, without holding it, one should place it in front of oneself and stand in front of a nun.

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say this:

original: 'phags ma dgongs su gsol /🔽bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de /
analyzed: 'phags ma dgongs su gsol / bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'di rnyed de /
translated: “Noble one, please pay attention!🔽I, the nun so-and-so, have obtained this impermissible thing.

original: bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung pa ma lags pa 'di byin gyis brlab bo //
analyzed: bdag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dngos po rung pa ma lags pa 'di byin gyis brlab bo //
translated: I, the nun so-and-so, will consecrate this impermissible thing.

original: dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dngos po rung ba ma lags pa 'dis dngos po rung ba bsgrub par bgyi'o //
translated: With this impermissible thing, I will obtain a permissible thing.”

original: de bzhin du @185b lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du @185b lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: Repeat this three times.

original: nyan pa'i dge slong mas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nyan pa'i dge slong mas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: The nun who listens should say, “It is a method.”

original: bdag nyid kyis legs so zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis legs so zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: “It is good,” she should say to herself.

original: rung bde gsum gang byas kyang 'dra ste /
analyzed: rung bde gsum gang byas kyang 'dra ste /
translated: It is the same if any of the three suitable things is done.

original: bdag gir bya ba med pas de la reg gam reg tu bcug na yang 'gyod par mi bya'o//
analyzed: bdag gir bya ba med pas de la reg gam reg tu bcug na yang 'gyod par mi bya'o//
translated: Since there is no ownership, if she touches it or has it touched, she should not regret it.

original: de ni dngos po rung ba ma yin pa rung bar bya ba'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni dngos po rung ba ma yin pa rung bar bya ba'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the rite and the action of making an unsuitable thing suitable.

original: lhung bzed tshol ba'i skabs nas /
analyzed: lhung bzed tshol ba'i skabs nas /
translated: In the section on seeking a begging bowl:

original: yang dge slong ma gang dag lhung bzed ldan pa lda med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed par pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spad pa'i lhung byed do ;
analyzed: yang dge slong ma gang dag lhung bzed ldan pa lda med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed par pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed grub na spad pa'i lhung byed do ;
translated: “If any nun, while possessing a begging bowl and having a suitable one, seeks another new begging bowl because she wants a good one, then if the begging bowl is finished, she has committed an offense entailing suspension.

original: / dge slong ma des lhung bzed de dge slong ma'i 'khor la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: / dge slong ma des lhung bzed de dge slong ma'i 'khor la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: That nun should offer that begging bowl to the community of nuns.

original: dge slong ma'i 'khor gyi lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong ma de la dge slong ma khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i 'khor gyi lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong ma de la dge slong ma khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya /

translated: You should not give it to anyone else. You should use it gradually, slowly, and carefully until it breaks.’🔽“The nun who keeps a bowl that is not a proper alms bowl should do the following.

translated: He should go for alms with both bowls.🔽If he gets dry food, he should put it in the unblessed bowl.

original: gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pas blang bar bya'o //🔽gtsug lag khong du 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor byas te lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa mdun du bzhag nas lhung bzed byin @187b gyis brlabs par bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'bras chan gsher ba rnyed na lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pas blang bar bya'o // gtsug lag khong du 'ongs nas dkyil 'khor byas te lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa mdun du bzhag nas lhung bzed byin @187b gyis brlabs par bza' bar bya'o //
translated: If he gets moist food, he should put it in the blessed bowl.🔽When he returns to the monastery, he should make a mandala, put the unblessed bowl in front of it, and eat the food from the blessed bowl.

original: zos zin na byi dor dang kha zas 'bags pa'i dril phyi bya ba yang dang por lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa la bya zhing de'i 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa la bya'o //
analyzed: zos zin na byi dor dang kha zas 'bags pa'i dril phyi bya ba yang dang por lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa la bya zhing de'i 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa la bya'o //
translated: When he has finished eating, he should wash the bowls, first the unblessed one, then the blessed one.

original: bkru ba dang / bskam pa dang / lci bas drud pa la yang de bzhin bya'o //
analyzed: bkru ba dang / bskam pa dang / lci bas drud pa la yang de bzhin bya'o //
translated: It should be done in the same way when washing, drying, or rubbing with a stone.

original: gal te lhung bzed kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te lhung bzed kyi ngos khung gnyis yod na bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel ba med pa gzhug par bya zhing cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
translated: If the bowl has two sides, the better side should be the side without the seal, and the side with the seal should be the other side.

original: gal te ngos khung gcig yod la /
analyzed: gal te ngos khung gcig yod la /
translated: If the bowl has only one side,

original: gal te shod khung bzang na gcig tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /
analyzed: gal te shod khung bzang na gcig tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /
translated: if the bottom is better, the bowl without the seal should be placed on the bottom.

original: ngos khung du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: ngos khung du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The bowl with the seal should be placed on the side.

original: gal te ngos khung bzang na ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /
analyzed: gal te ngos khung bzang na ngos khung du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /
translated: If the side is better, the bowl without the seal should be placed on the side.

original: shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: shod du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The bowl with the seal should be placed on the bottom.

original: lhung bzed kyi las byed pa na gal te rnga bo gnyis yod na /
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi las byed pa na gal te rnga bo gnyis yod na /
translated: When using the bowl, if there are two sides,

original: rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bsreg par bya zhing /
analyzed: rdza bo bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bsreg par bya zhing /
translated: In the better kiln, one should burn the unrelated alms-bowl.

original: cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bsreg par bya'o //
translated: In the other, one should burn the consecrated alms-bowl.

original: gal te rdza bo gcig yod na gal te 'og ma legs par tshos par gyur na /🔽'og tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /
analyzed: gal te rdza bo gcig yod na gal te 'og ma legs par tshos par gyur na / 'og tu lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /
translated: If there is only one kiln, if the lower part is well-fired,🔽one should place the unrelated alms-bowl below.

original: steng du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: steng du lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place the consecrated alms-bowl above.

original: gal te steng du bzhag pa legs par tshogs par gyur na /🔽steng du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /
analyzed: gal te steng du bzhag pa legs par tshogs par gyur na / steng du lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhag par bya zhing /
translated: If the upper part is well-fired,🔽one should place the unrelated alms-bowl above.

original: 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og tu lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should place the consecrated alms-bowl below.

original: lam du 'gron lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis bkur bar bya ste /🔽de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /
analyzed: lam du 'gron lhung bzed kyi snod gnyis bkur bar bya ste / de la bzang po gang yin pa der lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa gzhug par bya zhing /
translated: On the road, one should carry two alms-bowls.🔽In the better one, one should place the unrelated alms-bowl.

original: cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: cig shos su lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa gzhug par bya'o //
translated: In the other, one should place the consecrated alms-bowl.

original: gal te khur rtsa ba 'ga' zhig yod na de la lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya zhing /
analyzed: gal te khur rtsa ba 'ga' zhig yod na de la lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya zhing /
translated: If there is any load at all, he should carry the consecrated alms bowl.

original: bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bkur bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bkur bar bya'o //
translated: He should carry the unconnected alms bowl himself.

original: gal te khur rtsa ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g-yon pas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bkur bar bya zhing /🔽phrag pa @188a * //
analyzed: gal te khur rtsa ba 'ga' yang med na phrag pa g-yon pas lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa bkur bar bya zhing / phrag pa @188a * //
translated: If there is no load at all, he should carry the unconnected alms bowl on his left shoulder.

original: g-yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs pa bkur bar bya'o //
translated: He should carry the consecrated alms bowl on his right shoulder.

original: 'di ni de'i chad pa'i las yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni de'i chad pa'i las yin te /
translated: This is his punishment.

original: tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su srung bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims yang dag par rjes su srung bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcang bar bya'o //
translated: He should carry it for as long as he lives, in order to guard his morality.

original: de ni lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa bsko ba'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: de ni lhung bzed 'brel pa med pa 'brim pa bsko ba'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: This is the ritual and the action for appointing the alms bowl carrier.🔽The section on the downfall of accusing someone of a serious offense.

original: gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na /
analyzed: gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed kyi skabs nas yang dge slong ma gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba brjod na /
translated: “A nun who accuses someone who is not fully ordained of a serious offense commits a downfall.

original: dge 'dun gyi gnang pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnang pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa'i zhar la /
translated: Except with the permission of the community, there is an offense of wrongdoing.”🔽In addition, it is said, “A nun who is a sinful bhikṣuṇī should be appointed to go to the houses of the laity.”

original: dge slong dang dge slong ma sdig pa can dag khyim rnams so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste //
analyzed: dge slong dang dge slong ma sdig pa can dag khyim rnams so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste //
translated: The way to appoint her is as follows.

original: khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
analyzed: khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
translated: A nun who has five qualities should not be appointed to go to the houses of the laity, even if she has been appointed.

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste ;
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste ;
translated: She should be removed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim mi shes pa'o //
translated: Going out of desire, going out of hatred, going out of ignorance, going out of fear, and not knowing which houses have been visited and which have not.

original: khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
analyzed: khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i dge slong ma chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
translated: A nun who has five qualities should be appointed to go to the houses of the laity, even if she has not been appointed.

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
translated: And one who has been appointed should not be dismissed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / go bar byas pa dang ma byas pa'i khyim shes pa'o //
translated: Not going out of desire, not going out of hatred, not going out of ignorance, not going out of fear, and knowing the homes where one has and has not been understood.

original: 'di ltar bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bsko bar bya'o //
translated: One should appoint in this way.

original: je dang po spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: je dang po spro bar bya ste /
translated: First, one should encourage her.

original: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: “Bhikṣuṇī so-and-so, are you able to go to the homes of the laity and make yourself understood to the bhikṣus and bhikṣuṇīs?”

original: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If she is able, she should say, “I am able.”

original: de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas /
translated: After that, the bedding should be arranged,

original: gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong ma rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: the gaṇḍī should be struck, and the bhikṣuṇīs should be summoned with the proclamation.

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol bar byas @188b te las bya'o //🔽'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong ma gcig gis gsol bar byas @188b te las bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: When the entire community of nuns is present and agrees, a nun should request the action and it should be done.🔽This is how it should be done.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should sit and say this:

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
translated: “Noble Saṅgha of nuns, please listen!

original: dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rigs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid de /
analyzed: dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rigs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid de /
translated: The monk Aśthabhuti and the nun Prasenā have been acting in such a way that a great crowd of people has become rightly contemptuous.

original: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro na /
analyzed: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par spro na /
translated: If the nun named so-and-so is willing to make herself known in the houses,

original: gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
translated: then if it seems appropriate to the community of noble nuns,

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste /
translated: May the noble Saṅgha of nuns permit me,🔽and may the noble Saṅgha of nuns appoint the nun so-and-so to inform the households,

original: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid do //
analyzed: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid do //
translated: and the nun so-and-so will inform the households of the monk so-and-so and the nun so-and-so.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The action is as follows:

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
translated: “May the noble Saṅgha of nuns listen to me.

original: dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid nas /
analyzed: dge slong 'phral ba dang dge slong ma gsal ma ci nas kyang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs ma dad par rig par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim rnams su spyod par bgyid nas /
translated: The monk so-and-so and the nun so-and-so are acting in such a way that a large group of people will know that they are not faithful,

original: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyi bar spro ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral ba dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyi bar spro ste /
translated: and the nun so-and-so is willing to inform the households of the monk so-and-so and the nun so-and-so.

original: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste /
analyzed: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko ste /
translated: Therefore, the Saṅgha is promoting the nun so-and-so to inform the houses.🔽If the Saṅgha is ready to promote the nun so-and-so to inform the houses of the sudden and the clear, then let the Saṅgha listen to this.

original: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral pa dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid na 'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi🔽bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas /🔽dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bskos lags te /
analyzed: dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong 'phral pa dang / dge slong ma gsal ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid na 'phags ma gang dag dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang nas / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di khyim rnams su so sor go bar bgyid par bskos lags te /
translated: The Saṅgha is promoting the nun so-and-so to inform the houses.

original: 'di ltar cang mi @189a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi @189a * //
translated: Since the Saṅgha has consented to and agreed upon the promotion of the nun so-and-so to inform the houses,

original: gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: it is settled.

original: dge slong ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The nun who is to inform the houses should act in accordance with the following points.

original: dge slong ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas khyim rnams su 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong ma khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas khyim rnams su 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: The nun who is to inform the houses should say the following to the houses:

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed nyon cig / khyim rnams su khyim sun par byed pa dang / gnas rnams su gnas sun par byed pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed nyon cig / khyim rnams su khyim sun par byed pa dang / gnas rnams su gnas sun par byed pa 'di lta ste /
translated: “Venerable ones, listen! This person who is causing trouble in the houses and trouble in the monasteries is like🔽a hail storm that falls on a perfect field of rice, destroying the rice, ruining it, and making it unfit.

original: dper na / 'bras s'a lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras s'a lu de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang / bu ram shing gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po zhes bya ba byung na /
analyzed: dper na / 'bras s'a lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras s'a lu de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang / bu ram shing gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po zhes bya ba byung na /
translated: Or it is like the disease known as red rot that strikes a perfect field of sugarcane,

original: 'di ltar bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba lta bu dag yod kyis /
analyzed: 'di ltar bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba lta bu dag yod kyis /
translated: It is like sugarcane that is burned, rotten, and spoiled.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag ;
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag ;
translated: Venerable ones,

original: khyed cag dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig /'di ltar dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig ba bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi /
analyzed: khyed cag dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig /'di ltar dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig ba bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi /
translated: do not take the word of this monk and this nun as authoritative. Just as a rabbit cannot give birth to a lion, these two are unfit to be in this Dharma and Vinaya.

original: bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan kun shes koo ndi nya dang / rlangs pa dang rta thul dang / bzang ldan dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs dang / sh'a ri'i bu dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan kun shes koo ndi nya dang / rlangs pa dang rta thul dang / bzang ldan dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs dang / sh'a ri'i bu dang /

original: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa stsal du gsol /
analyzed: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa stsal du gsol /

original: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: This is to be repeated a second and a third time.

original: de ni bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa gsol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the request for the destruction of the precepts.

original: de'i 'og tu sbyin bdag de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sbyin bdag de thos pa'i nye 'khor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nye 'khor du bzhag nas /
translated: After that, that patron is expelled from the vicinity of the hearing and placed in the vicinity of the seeing.

original: dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig ga las bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig ga las bya'o //
translated: A single bhikṣuṇī should make the proclamation alone.

original: 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: This is how it is done.

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should sit and say this:

original: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams bdag la gsan du gsol /

original: dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te /
analyzed: dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te /

original: des sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: des sangs rgyas sam /
translated: He had not offered anything to the Buddha,

original: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: chos sam / dge 'dun nam /
translated: the Dharma, or the Saṅgha,🔽or to any agreeable bhikṣus.

original: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong ma rnams lam phul ba'am yangs sum btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /
analyzed: yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong ma rnams lam phul ba'am yangs sum btang ba ci yang ma mchis te /

original: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te /
analyzed: des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod bsrabs shing yongs su bas te /
translated: As a result of not having offered anything or given anything away, his wealth diminished and was exhausted.

analyzed: yongs su mthar thug nas de la dge 'dun don bzhed pa phan pa bzhed pas bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal @195a * //
translated: When it was completely used up, the Saṅgha, who wanted to help him, gave him the vows of training.

original: ba las dmag dpon seng ge de yang longs spyod 'phel te /
analyzed: ba las dmag dpon seng ge de yang longs spyod 'phel te /

original: dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par gsol na /
analyzed: dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams las bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par gsol na /
translated: General Siṃha asked the noble Saṅgha to destroy the vows of training that he had received.

original: gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par mdzad do //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun 'phags ma rnams kyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par mdzad do //

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa der dge slong ma rnams kyis 'gro bar bya ;
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa der dge slong ma rnams kyis 'gro bar bya ;
translated: The nuns should go to the place where the training precepts have been destroyed.

original: stan la longs spyad par bya /
analyzed: stan la longs spyad par bya /
translated: They should use the seats there.

original: bsod snyoms blang bar bya /
analyzed: bsod snyoms blang bar bya /
translated: They should accept alms.

original: chos bstan par bya'o //🔽de ni khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa'i cho ga dang las so //
analyzed: chos bstan par bya'o // de ni khyim gyi bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa'i cho ga dang las so //
translated: They should teach the Dharma.🔽This is the ritual and the rite for destroying the training precepts for the general populace.

original: so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga dang sngags ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: The ritual and the mantra for confessing to the Saṅgha are as follows.

original: mtshams kyi nang na dge slong ma ji snyed 'khod pa thams cad bsdu ni mi dgos te /
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang na dge slong ma ji snyed 'khod pa thams cad bsdu ni mi dgos te /
translated: It is not necessary to gather all the nuns who are within the same boundary.

original: gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong ma gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong ma de dag la phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong ma gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong ma de dag la phyag 'tshal te /
translated: Having gone inside the dwelling, he should pay respect to the nuns he sees, in such a way that it is well known to those who are in the dwelling and so forth.

original: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, sitting in front of the senior nun, with palms joined, he should say this:

original: 'phags ma dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rig pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba byung gi chos de so sor 'chags so zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags ma dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rig pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba byung gi chos de so sor 'chags so zhes lan cig brjod par bya'o //
translated: “Noble ones, I have committed an offense that is a basis of slander, which I confess. I confess that offense.”

original: de ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam par brjod pas so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam par brjod pas so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is said to be confession by way of expressing regret, but it is not the actual confession.

original: bshags pa ni ji ltar ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bshags pa ni ji ltar ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: The actual confession is like the confession in front of one person that is taught for when a downfall of a serious offense has occurred.

original: de ni so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga sngags so //
analyzed: de ni so sor bshags par bya ba dge 'dun la rig par bya ba'i cho ga sngags so //
translated: That is the mantra for the rite of confessing to the Saṅgha.

original: dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The rites and procedures of the chapter on the bhikṣuṇīs are complete.

original: // / da ni gso sbyong gi gzhi'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni gso sbyong gi gzhi'i skabs kyi cho ga dang las rnams rdzogs par bya ste /
translated: Now, the rites and procedures of the chapter on the basis of the purification and restoration should be completed.

original: sdom la / spong ba dang ni gnas dang mtshams //
analyzed: sdom la / spong ba dang ni gnas dang mtshams //
translated: The summary: Abandoning, staying, and the border,🔽Not separating, releasing, cutting,

original: mi 'bral dgrol dang bcad pa dang / mtshams chen gnang nas @195b cig car dgrol //
analyzed: mi 'bral dgrol dang bcad pa dang / mtshams chen gnang nas @195b cig car dgrol //
translated: And releasing immediately after giving permission for the great border.🔽Cutting immediately, Dharma robes,

original: cig car bcad dang chos gos dang // mtshams ma bcad dang yongs dag dang // 'dun dang gnyi ga smyos dang 'bad //
analyzed: cig car bcad dang chos gos dang // mtshams ma bcad dang yongs dag dang // 'dun dang gnyi ga smyos dang 'bad //
translated: Not cutting the border, complete purity,🔽Intent, both, insanity, and effort.🔽Gathering, harm, remembering,🔽Doubt, remembering doubt,

original: 'du dang gnod dang dran pa dang // yid gnyis dran dang yid gnyis dang // ltung bar mthu dang yid gnyis gyur //
analyzed: 'du dang gnod dang dran pa dang // yid gnyis dran dang yid gnyis dang // ltung bar mthu dang yid gnyis gyur //
translated: And falling into doubt.🔽Dispute, not the actual,

original: rtsod dang dngos nyid ma yin dang / gcig la sogs pas byin brlab pa'i //
analyzed: rtsod dang dngos nyid ma yin dang / gcig la sogs pas byin brlab pa'i //
translated: And the consecration of one and so forth.

original: sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin //
analyzed: sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin //
translated: This is the correct summary of the chapter.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi la zhi gnas gso sbyong gi skabs nas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi la zhi gnas gso sbyong gi skabs nas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
translated: At the time of the purification and restoration ceremony, the monk who is the overseer of the renunciate’s duties should be appointed.🔽The monk who is the overseer of the renunciate’s duties should be appointed if he has five qualities.

original: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: If he does not have these five qualities, he should not be appointed, even if he has been appointed, he should be dismissed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa'o //

analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
translated: The monk who is the overseer of the renunciate’s duties should be appointed if he has five qualities.🔽If he has these five qualities, he should be appointed,

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste /
translated: even if he has not been appointed, he should not be dismissed.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'dun bas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa'o ;
analyzed: 'dun bas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa'o ;
translated: He should not go out of desire, hatred, confusion, or fear. He should know whether or not the procedure of relinquishment has been performed.

original: /'di ltar bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: /'di ltar bsko bar bya'o //
translated: He should be appointed like this.

original: je dang por spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: je dang por spro bar bya ste /

analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal te bar spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o //

analyzed: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /

analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la /

analyzed: dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
translated: a single monk should make a proposal and perform the procedure.

original: 'di ltar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ste /

original: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: He should sit down and say this:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ;
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol ;
translated: “Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na /

translated: The Saṅgha is promoting the monk named so-and-so to be the manager of the Saṅgha’s renunciate property.

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do //

analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //

analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /

analyzed: dge slong ming 'od zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste /

translated: Those who do not agree should speak.🔽The Saṅgha has agreed and consented to appointing monk so-and-so as the manager of the rainy-season retreat.

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do //
translated: The Saṅgha has appointed monk so-and-so as the manager of the rainy-season retreat.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //

analyzed: dge slong spong pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos ni 'di ltar bya ste /

analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas spong ba'i khang par chag chag gdab par bya /
translated: “The monk who is the caretaker of a meditation hut should sprinkle the meditation hut with water,

original: phyag dar bya /
analyzed: phyag dar bya /

analyzed: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya //

original: chag chag gdab par bya //
analyzed: chag chag gdab par bya //

original: phyag dar bya /
analyzed: phyag dar bya /
translated: sweep it,

original: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya //
analyzed: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya //
translated: and smear it with cow dung.

original: lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya /
analyzed: lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya /

analyzed: gand'i chung du brdung ngo //

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa ran par bya'o //
